com.compendium.io.udig
Class UDigCommunicationManager

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.compendium.io.udig.UDigCommunicationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class UDigCommunicationManager
extends java.lang.Thread

This class handles the communications back and forth with uDIG. It creates and manages the two Sockets, the one to send message on and the one to recieve them on.

Author:
Michelle Bachler
